definitions.title: loc.
definitions.body: (cf. Palm. n. pr. [[שלמן]] GACooke:299; Ph. n. pr. div. [[שלמן]] Lzb:377 GACooke:42; As. Salamanu, of Moabit. prince COT:Ho 10, 14; n.pr.div. Šulmanu, v. foll.);—[[בֵּית אַרְבֵּאל]] ´[[כְּשׁׂד שׁ]]:Ho 10:14, Salaman (cf. also Field:Hex. ii. 957);—dub., We Now think = foll. (and cl. ins. after Hosea’s time), cf. also Marti; others cp. Moabitish prince, v. supra; Spiegelberg:ZA xiii (1898), 120 f. suggests n.pr.loc., cp. Ša-ra-ma-na in Egypt.
